sentence.text: Mutations and deletions of the interleukin-1 receptor accessory protein like 1 (regulation of postsynapse organization) gene, located on the X chromosome, are associated with intellectual disability (ID) and autism spectrum disorder (ASD).

Here we show that the X-linked intellectual disability protein interleukin-1 receptor accessory protein like 1 (regulation of postsynapse organization) regulates dendrite morphology of mice hippocampal neurons and induced pluripotent stem cell-derived neurons from a patient carrying a null mutation of IL1RAPL1 gene.
